body_html:
@anj-s, I think you wrote the deferred tensor implementation for this layer, right?

@nairouz , while we investigate, can you try writing your own training loop? (doing a for loop over the data, then passing a loss function to optimizer.minimize for some tensorflow optimizer). I believe that's supposed to work.

body:
@anj-s, I think you wrote the deferred tensor implementation for this layer, right?

@nairouz , while we investigate, can you try writing your own training loop? (doing a for loop over the data, then passing a loss function to optimizer.minimize for some tensorflow optimizer). I believe that's supposed to work.
